channel.title: Jagged Arrays
channel.description:
Hello all,
I've been reading this Java book for a little bit whenever I have free time, I'm quite into it and come to a little section labeled "Jagged Arrays". I'm having quite some trouble understanding them. Here's the example.
[code=java]String[][] teams = { {"Henry Blake", "Johny Mulcahu"}, { "Benjamin Pierce", "John McIntryre", "Jonathan Tuttle" } };[/code]
Now in this 2 dimensional array, theres 2 in the first, and 3 in the second. Would that give errors and how would I create one. String[][] teams = new teams[2][3] would it bee something like that?
Thanks in advanced.

item.title: Jagged Arrays
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

Hello all,

I’ve been reading this Java book for a little bit whenever I have free time, I’m quite into it and come to a little section labeled “Jagged Arrays”. I’m having quite some trouble understanding them. Here’s the example.

Now in this 2 dimensional array, theres 2 in the first, and 3 in the second. Would that give errors and how would I create one.
